3b. verify ID of access token
introspection

ol.li:
frontend app login (through Ory stack: Hydra configured to use Kratos for authentication)
Login credentials→ Authorization Code

frontend app token exchange
Authorization Code → Access Token

frontend access restricted API through verifying token's scopes + user infromation obtained from a separate internal endpoint
Access Token + user ID→ personal data

switch.text: frontend app login (through Ory stack: Hydra configured to use Kratos for authentication)...
